aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Anurag Madathamkandy
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am a full-stack developer specializing in React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Django, PostgreSQL, and other technologies. My expertise lies in creating robust and scalable web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. With a strong focus on problem-solving and innovation, I strive to build efficient and user-friendly digital solutions that meet the needs of clients and users alike.

services.title: Website development
services.text: website development, leveraging the MERN stack to create responsive and feature-rich web applications. My services include custom design, seamless API integration, and ongoing maintenance to ensure optimal performance and security.

services.title: Database design
services.text: I specialize in designing efficient and scalable databases, ensuring your data is well-organized and easy to manage. Whether you need a relational database using SQL or a NoSQL solution, I can create a database architecture that meets your needs and supports your application's growth.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.text: Responsive design ensures that your website or application looks great and functions well on any device, whether it's a desktop, tablet, or smartphone. I specialize in creating designs that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes and resolutions, providing users with a consistent and optimal viewing experience across all devices.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
